exchange

Class ExchangeRates

  • java.lang.Object
    • exchange.ExchangeRates

  • public class ExchangeRates
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExchangeRates(java.lang.String... currencies)
      Creates an object of exchange rates from the provided alphabetic currency codes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Currency> getRates() 
      static void print(Currency currency)
      Prints a currency name, a currency value at the last registered date and a change for the valid currency or an error message for the invalid currency.

      Prints a currencies in the provided list as described in the print(Currency).

      • print

        public static void print(Currency currency)
        Prints a currency name, a currency value at the last registered date and a change for the valid currency or an error message for the invalid currency.
        Parameters:
        currency - currency to print
        See Also:
        print(List), Currency.isValid()
